DOC.detailed_description: Patients fulfil inclusion criterion ask sign consent participate study , day operation routine preoperative anesthesiological evaluation . If include study assign one two study group - off-pump CABG , CABG CPB . After arrival operate theatre 4.5 ml blood obtain EDTA vial peripheral venous canula , place previously routine anesthesiologic management . Additional blood sample obtain 3 , 6 , 12 , 24 48 hour operation . Each vial immediately label identification number submit laboratory , smear May-Grunwald-Giemsa staining prepare . The smear panoptical examine 400 consecutive leucocyte assign one follow line : neutrophil , eosinophil , basophil , monocyte lymphocyte . Neutrophils divide : segment , band , metamyelocytes , myelocyte , promyelocytes , myeloblast . The laboratory staff blind type operation . Differences subsets granulocytes group timepoints wil analysed mean appropriate parametric nonparametric statistical test . The SIRS criterion refer : 1 . Intraoperative variable : number distal anastomosis , time aorta/artery clamping , time intraoperative hypotension , suction pump use , serum lactate ; 2 . Postoperative variable : serum CRP , blood product transfusion , chest tube drainage .
DOC.criteria: Elective urgent CABG CPB without ( offpump CABG ) Signed informed consent Denied consent Signs infection and/or inflammation ( least 2/4 SIRS criterion ) Emergency operation Organ failure/dysfunction
